price: بىز بۇلۇتتىن ھاجەتكە قاراپ يامغۇر ياغدۇردۇق، ئۇنى زېمىندا توختاتتۇق، ئۇنى قۇرۇتۇۋېتىشكە ئەلۋەتتە قادىرمىز[18].
arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَسۡكَنَّٰهُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابِۭ بِهِۦ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan biqadarin fa-askannāhu fī al-arḍi wa-innā ʿalā dhahābin bihi laqādirūna
translations: then We cause it to settle
